mapper.select: SELECT CLIENTID , USERID , PASSWORD , NICKNAME , EMAIL , AUTHCODE , MENUTYPE , REGDATE , MODDATE , useYn FROM HYUSERS

SELECT CLIENTID as clientId , USERID as userId , NICKNAME as nickName , EMAIL as email , AUTHCODE as authCode , MENUTYPE as menuType , REGDATE as regDate , MODDATE as modDate , useYn as useYn FROM HYUSERS WHERE userId = #{userId} AND passWord = #{passWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HYUSERS ( CLIENTID , USERID , PASSWORD , NICKNAME , EMAIL , AUTHCODE , MENUTYPE , REGDATE , MODDATE , USEYN ) VALUES ( '01', #{userId}, #{passWord}, #{nickName}, #{email}, '00000AH', 'A', to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), '', 'Y' )
